relation: The food is pretty good here at Mount Ida College
The different dorms are really cool and really nice
The classes are really good and the professors are just beyond amazing.
It's okay to be nervous about leaving home for the first time and to be scared about being on your own. Don't be afraid about making friends because you will and just make sure to be yourself.
This is one of the best schools that i have ever gone to and I love this college more than anything. I wish it wasn't so expensive though

textAfterTable: MATTHEW from Newton, MA 09/28/2011 Reviewer is A current student here. 1 out of 2 people found this review useful. 2 of 18 Categories Comments Tips for prospective students It's a really great school and they have a wide variety of majors. Bang for the buck This is a private college and it's pretty expensive. Am enjoying being here I'm really glad I came to Mount Ida, it's a small school but I have a lot of friends and I'm really involved. Am learning a lot I love it here at Mount Ida and being in the graphic design major is awesome!! Login to rate or flag the reviews Matthew from RUTLAND, MA 02/28/2012 Reviewer is A current student here.
